title: Get Subscription with Unlock Protocol
description: By utilizing this contract, you can generate NFTs that are time-limited and designed for recurring subscriptions, tickets, token gating, and certifications that have an expiration date. Built on Ethereum, Unlock is an open-source protocol for memberships that function as time-bound NFTs. This platform simplifies the process of obtaining membership benefits for online communities and enables creators to monetize their content without relying on a middleman. With Unlock, integrating subscriptions and memberships into your projects becomes effortless.
